text: Tina (born Martina Csillagová; 11 March 1984) is a Slovak singer. She won the Best Female Singer prize at the Slávik Awards in 2011 and 2012. Tina co-hosted the 2011 edition of Czech/Slovak television series SuperStar alongside Leoš Mareš. She returned to host alongside Mareš in the first two series of The Voice Česko Slovensko. ==Personal life== Tina has a son, Leo, with footballer Richard Lásik. She married rapper in 2014. ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== *2004: Tina *2006: Chillin *2009: Veci sa menia *2011: S.E.X.Y. ==Awards and nominations== {| class="wikitable" |- ! width="1"|Year ! width="120"|Nominated work ! width="200"|Award ! width="200"|Category ! width="75"|Result ! width="1"|Ref |- |2011 |rowspan=2|Herself |rowspan=2|Slávik Awards |rowspan=2|Best Female Singer |Winner | |- |2012 |Winner | |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:People from Prešov Category:Slovak female singers Category:Slovak television presenters
